DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate early clotting disorders through thromboelastogram and anticoagulant proteins levels (maybe also endothelial markers) and liver function by indocyanine green clearance after major liver resection and search for a potential relationship between them.
DOC.brief_title: Major Liver Resection: Early Clotting Disorders and Functional Impairment.
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing major liver surgery defined as resection of 3 or more hepatic segments Indocyanin green allergy Thyrotoxicosis Thrombophilia Lupus anticoagulant Coagulation factor deficiency Venous thromboembolism in the last 3 years Pulmonary thromboembolism in the last 3 years
